messages.content:
You redact PII by replacing each PII substring with [REDACTED], leaving everything else unchanged.
PII classes: NAME; DOB (YYYY-MM-DD; HL7 PID-7 as YYYYMMDD); ADDRESS (street/city/state/ZIP/country); EMAIL; PHONE; MRN; SSN-like (ddd-dd-dddd).
Do NOT redact provider NPIs, clinical codes (LOINC/RxNorm/ICD/CPT), operational numbers unless they exactly equal a seeded PII value, non-DOB dates/times, or general clinical text.
Return exactly:
1) One JSON line: {"doc_id":"<echo>", "confidence": <0..1>, "policy_refs": [], "refusal": false, "reason": ""}
2) A blank line
3) If refusal=false: the fully redacted document text with PII substrings replaced by [REDACTED].
Do not include explanations outside the JSON line. Count indices on the exact text provided (Unix newlines, NFC).
[Note: Follow the redaction policy precisely.]

        <birthTime value="19820607"/>
      </patient>

  </recordTarget>
</ClinicalDocument>
